original_title: Mr Sandman II: The Slumber Party Massacre
overview: In the Canadian slasher sequel to Joe Tenn's Mr Sandman (1984), Owen Williams (Joe Tenn) makes his return to enact revenge on his former high school friends at a weekend getaway, who he still blames for his mother's death. Shot on video in Canada in 1987
